query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.id) FROM albums a 
   JOIN tracks t ON t.albumId = a.id 
   JOIN audioFiles af ON af.trackId = t.id) as albums_with_audio,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM albums) as total_albums,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audioFiles) as total_audio_files;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.38fa72cffd94 --database b5PCTDMDy4xxT8TnZ4kC9Z --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.id) FROM albums a 
   JOIN tracks t ON t.albumId = a.id 
   JOIN audioFiles af ON af.trackId = t.id) as albums_with_audio,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM albums) as total_albums,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audioFiles) as total_audio_files;
